Description.Name: Flagged Stars
Description.Details:
<color=#BFBFBF>Shortly after arriving in orbit over {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, Farah flags a new encrypted packet pushed through the secure [[DM.Factions[faction_MinnesotaTribe],Tribe]] channel Mizuki provided during your first briefing.

Once decrypted, the payload opens to reveal a dense starmap overlay. Thirteen systems, scattered across the deep Rimward Periphery, marked with internal Minnesota Tribe designations. Each one represents a known or previously dormant asset: remote facilities, resource stockpiles, fallback shelters, and research outposts.

These are not battlefield rumors or salvage logs. This is real infrastructure. Real reach. And it’s only being shared with your crew now that you’ve joined their side.

Another entry stands out, a simple statement likely based on your own reportings.

<color=#DFDFDF>“System Entry: MELIDRON – Noted under Potential Ghost Bear Watch Occupation”</color>

<color=#BFBFBF>Farah skims the entry, already aligning the rest of the data to jump coordinates and threat overlays.</color> “Alright… syncing them in. Let’s see what we’re working with.”

<color=#BFBFBF>For the first time, you see the scattered edge of the Tribe’s real territory—or at last what they are willing to share with a newcomer. But these are no longer myths, no longer rumors. Just stars, waiting to be fought for.</color>

Description.Name: Integrate the data into the Argo’s star map.
Integrate the data into the Argo’s star map.
Description.Details: <color=#BFBFBF>Farah uploads the packet to navigation control. Thirteen systems are marked as Minnesot Tribe. One as potentially under [[DM.Factions[faction_GhostBearWatch],Ghost Bear Watch]] control. The war is spreading—and now you can see where.</color>
